problem.markdown:
1. Structures with shorter periods of vibration tend to reduce acceleration. () True (x) False
2) Rollers are used in the Base isolation method. () True (x) False
3) Active control devices incorporate real-time recoding instrumentation on the ground. (x) True () False
4) Dampers stabilize against violent motion caused by harmonic motion. (x) True () False
5) The TMD system relies on the sloshing wave developing at the free surface of the fluid to dissipate a portion of the dynamic energy. () True (x) False
problem.p: 1. Structures with shorter periods of vibration tend to reduce acceleration.
2) Rollers are used in the Base isolation method.
3) Active control devices incorporate real-time recoding instrumentation on the ground.
4) Dampers stabilize against violent motion caused by harmonic motion.
5) The TMD system relies on the sloshing wave developing at the free surface of the fluid to dissipate a portion of the dynamic energy.
